website_summaries.verdict: Don't let the simple design fool you, these soup spoons are smooth, sturdy and fit in easily with most silverware collections.
pros: Available in a set of 6 or 8 spoons
The spoon's edges are smooth and gentle on the corners of your mouth
They have the same look and feel as a restaurant-quality soup spoon
The simple design is easy to match with preexisting silverware
The handle, while thin, is sturdy

customer_reviews.title: Long hunt for perfect soup spoon over!
customer_reviews.text: The partner in crime and I have hunted far and wide for the perfect soup spoon. You know the one you get at a restaurant, the one you ask the waiter "tell me where to find these, I need them in my life"!!! and he/she just looks at you like you sprouted horns and asked for their first born? These are them. I'm a soupaholic. A bowl of something hearty, fresh bread, and the perfect spoon? That's a fabulous day right there, AND they're dishwasher safe!!
customer_reviews.author: Nic Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great quality soup spoons!
customer_reviews.text: I’m really glad that I made this purchase! I needed soup spoons because they did not come with the silverware set that I bought. These seem really durable and they have a nice weight to them! They are easy to clean and have put into the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Ckayy

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Well made!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect!! I was looking for some soup spoons and this set is inexpensive, extremely well made and has a good weight to it. I would definitely recommend to anyone looking into purchasing these to buy them! I noticed other reviewers saying the edges are rough and sharp.. but that wasn't the issue with me at all. The packaging was well done. It came in the box of course, however not only was it in a plastic case, each spoon was individually wrapped. I'm so happy I bought these and not a different set I was looking into. Well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Great Spoons!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one set of these spoons and liked them so much I bought a 2nd set of 8. These spoons are the best soup spoons I've ever run across. I also enjoy using these spoons in place of my standard silverware spoons for other solid foods because they are a bit longer than standard and the spoon shape makes it easier to pick up solid foods when compared to my other standard spoons. Give these a try ... you'll see!
customer_reviews.author: Razzierb

customer_reviews.title: I won't lie.
customer_reviews.text: At first i hesitated to order this set bc of those reviews from those who rwceived a set that had sharp edges. But just a chance anyway. Glad i did bc lucky me, i got a set that came with no sharp edges. This set is exactly what i had hoped for at a fair price. Yes, i would recommend this set to others and hope they too get a set with no sharp edges. They deserve 5 stars for speedy shipping too.
customer_reviews.author: sandra jean

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with my purchase and would recommend this product! I prefer round dinner spoons to the oblong style and bought these AmoVee Round Spoons to replace 6 (similarly styled) missing spoons from my good cutlery set. I received them yesterday and by their weight and structure think they're excellent quality. They washed nicely before putting them away. Time will tell but I think they'll last a lifetime!
customer_reviews.author: Mmd201

customer_reviews.title: Great soup spoon for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these soup spoons. Was so pleasantly surprised at the quality when considering the price. They are a simple design with a nice bowl area for your soup and good sized handles. When I put them next to my stainless, even though they have no pattern, they don't look like they were a last minute thought. Would recommend them highly. Truly 5 star all the way in my opinion and I rarely if ever give 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... one came wrapped individually and was shiny and in perfect condition. I ran them through the dishwasher right ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two sets of soup spoons and each one came wrapped individually and was shiny and in perfect condition. I ran them through the dishwasher right away and they look just as shiny. I have only used one to try it out (I haven't made soup yet this summer!) and it is just what I was looking for in a soup spoon. I also appreciate the email I received from the company asking if I was pleased with my purchase and requesting that I give an honest review of their product.
customer_reviews.author: FHR

customer_reviews.title: Love the size and shape of these soup spoons.
customer_reviews.text: These soup spoons are of good quality and well made. They are just the right size to use for soups. I also use them to eat ice cream and pudding. I wash them in the dishwasher and they come out looking like when I bought them. No water spots or black marks on them like some silverware get. The design is simple and goes well with my other silverware.
customer_reviews.author: D. Fugett

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality. Good, well-balanced weight. You'll enjoy these.
customer_reviews.text: I really like these spoons, which I gave myself for Christmas. These are heavier than the old spoons I replaced and simply feel better in your hand since the weight of the spoon feels "balanced". The bowl of the spoon is slightly larger than my old ones, too, and is just the right size for soups and other soft foods. I'm most impressed by the quality. Very nice product for a good price, which is unfortunately not always the case these days. (My only problem is that my new spoons were so nice that I had to immediately buy new soup and sandwich sets, which set me back a few pennies...but I'm eating in style.)
customer_reviews.author: SFox58

customer_reviews.title: Easiest 5 star ever. Great for soup and ice cream
customer_reviews.text: First, the shape is perfect. It feels great in the mouth, whether it's for soup or ice cream. Second, 18/10 stainless steel is very resistant to corrosion on a kitchen environment. Third, the spoon is comfortable to hold and use.
customer_reviews.author: Anton Pavlovich

customer_reviews.title: Rough sharp edges. Low quality ferritic steel.
customer_reviews.text: This is not the high quality polished stainless steel soon advertised. It is a ferritic steel, meaning it's magnetic, a lower quality stainless with minimal chromium and nickel content. It also has rough edges, not polished. I rolled the dice buying from a Chinese company on Amazon, and lost once again. I can't figure out where these great reviews are coming from!
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Vegas

customer_reviews.title: Super-smooth and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I love these spoons. They're such a perfect addition to our new soup bowls. They arrived really quickly and each one was individually packaged so there were no scuff marks or scratches. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: MeckMom

customer_reviews.title: Nice soup spoons !
customer_reviews.text: These turned out to be great soup spoons, I wasn’t expecting much because of the price but they arrived in a nice box all individually wrapped. They are just the right size and not heavy and they wash great in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: L. Rupp

customer_reviews.title: Nice weight and shine. Slightly sharp on holding edge.
customer_reviews.text: The soup spoons have a nice weight and feel good in the hand. Good sized "bowl" in the spoon portion and great high shine in the stainless steel. My only complaint is a bit of a rough/sharpish edge on a few of the handles. Not all, and not cut-your-hand sharp. But noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Bibi Reads, A LOT

customer_reviews.title: Terrific 5 Star Soup Spoons!
customer_reviews.text: I love soup spoons, and these are truly five stars! They feel substantial in your hand, no worrying that they will bend. And don't limit their use to soup. Cereal is also perfect for using these soup spoons! Highly recommend to everyone. Give them a try, you won't be sorry!
customer_reviews.author: Lady Gator

customer_reviews.title: Perfect spoon, great quality!
customer_reviews.text: The spoons arrived on time and were packaged perfectly. Each spoon was in a separate plastic wrapper then all of them were in one box. They are nice, heavy metal and seemed to be the perfect size. They are actually more than I expected for the money! My 20 year old daughter loves eating everything with soup spoons! We always kid around with her about using the huge spoons. I did not notice or feel any rough edges as other reviews stated. I put them all in the dishwasher before using them and they came out wonderful. I would buy more from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Carter

customer_reviews.title: Great value for attractive (and well-made) soup spoons!
customer_reviews.text: My husband has been asking for soup spoons for a long time, so I bought these for Christmas! (He was delighted!) Sturdy but attractive; very nice quality stainless steel; EXACTLY what I was hoping they'd be! Highly recommend this item and this seller!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. M.

customer_reviews.title: Four minus rating for the price and weight. Be aware of the sharp edges.
customer_reviews.text: I am giving it a four minus star rating. I sent the spoons back because the spoons have sharp rims and edges. It appeared that the manufacturer just cup through a thick sheet of metal to make the spoons, without filing them down or smoothing out the edges. However the spoons are fairly heavy, especially for the price charged. For the weight and price I don't feel right to give a three star rating, so I give it four stars.
customer_reviews.author: S. A. Fitchard

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great value!
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive, sturdy and ergonomic. These soup spoons feel good in the hand and in the mouth. The bowl of the spoon is a good size at about 1-3/4 inches wide and holds a reasonable amount of food. Some of the soup spoons I considered had bowl widths of 2-inches or more which may hold more food, but may be a struggle to fit in the mouth (a common complaint in the reviews of those products). Bought two sets of 8, plan to buy one more set. Great for cereal as well as soups and chili, which I didn't expect. These spoons seem like they would last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: DJJJS

customer_reviews.title: Not deep enough.
customer_reviews.text: - I would not call this soup spoon. - It will take me 1 hour to finish the soup if i use this spoon. - The bowl of spoon is so shallow that not much of soup can stay on it. Do not buy them as soup spoons. I used them to eat rice.
customer_reviews.author: Tony MN

customer_reviews.title: Super soup spoons!
customer_reviews.text: The bowl of this spoon is well shaped with no sharpish edges and is a useful and comfortable to the mouth size. It’s complemented by a gracefully curved and rounded at the end handle. I definitely recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen G.

customer_reviews.title: Dessert anyone?
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love my new spoons! So shiny and the size and shape are simply perfect for soup, chili, or dipping into a bowl of ice cream. They are sturdy although not heavy weighted. Sleek design is very easy to clean and maintain.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl E. Jack

customer_reviews.title: VERRRRY NICE!
customer_reviews.text: Love these!! I bought them mainly for grandkids to eat cereal instead of the regular egg shaped bowls on spoons... They gave these a "test run" and we give them an "A"!! Will be awesome for all the winter soups & stews grandma makes!! Nicely made too... Happy!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Soup's On - With these I'm Ready to Eat!
customer_reviews.text: I love these spoons! They make me want to eat even more soup. I couldn't be happier with this purchase; something I'd been putting off for quite some time. They arrived promptly and were exactly what I was expecting; maybe even better than what I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Mystery 101

customer_reviews.title: Arrived quickly, well packaged.  Highly recommends this seller.  Thank you!
customer_reviews.text: These were a birthday gift for my daughter who loves soup and wanted real soup spoons. Perfect! She was very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Deenie D. Sears

customer_reviews.title: As others have said, these are the Perfect Soup Spoon...
customer_reviews.text: I am a soup lover. We had a few real soup spoons among our flatware and none of them matched. I am so happy I found these. They are The Perfect Soup Spoon as far as I am concerned. They are of really good quality and I particularly like the extra length to them.
customer_reviews.author: R Santora

customer_reviews.title: Perfect soup spoon
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a set of these soup spoons to share with my daughter as we both like to eat soup with a larger soup spoon . They’re nice looking soup spoons and have had no problems with them . He seem to come out of the dishwasher fine . No complaints
customer_reviews.author: Just my opinion

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR SOUP AND PLAYING IN THE BLUE GRASS BAND
customer_reviews.text: I grew up in the British colonial world in Kenya and Tanzania. I hate using an ordinary spoon to eat soup. These do the job very well. They also are great for shoveling potting soul into your flower pots, they work well for string the gravy, and they are great for playing the spoons in a blue grass band because the handles are huge.
customer_reviews.author: Steve VN

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: I initially bought these to use for soup but I find we are actually using them for everything we would use the regular spoons for as well and they are now our most used spoons.
customer_reviews.author: Sharin Payne

customer_reviews.title: Sharp edge, poor finishing.
customer_reviews.text: The ending of the spoons has very sharp edge on every single one if them. I need to file the edge myself to avoid my fingers being cut. Poor finishing.
customer_reviews.author: K.C.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Love these spoons. I really didn’t think they would be this nice. Have put them in the dishwasher and they are still nice and shiny.❤️❤️
customer_reviews.author: A. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Rough unfinished tip on handle of spoons
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking BUT the tip of the handle is not smooth! It is rough, jagged even sharp! That’s unacceptable. It’s basically unfinished metal at the. Tip. I would not have bought these if I’d examined in person. Did i get a defective batch??? I saw another reviewer who also mentioned the rough tip.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: The workmanship and weight were just right, as was the size of the spoons' bowl. We are enjoying the soup spoons very much. I ordered two sets to use for dinner guests as well. I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ray

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love these spoons! They are a perfect weight. Not too big & not too small. Just right. Go through the dishwasher perfectly. I’ve always wanted soup spoons I'm glad I picked these.
customer_reviews.author: Merrilou Klug

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: After extensively researching the purchase of soup spoons, I chose these with which I could not be more pleased. The weight of the spoon and the bowl's size--coupled with the price--are perfect for my needs. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Soup Spoons, AmoVee
customer_reviews.text: These are just perfect spoons, good quality, shape, size etc. I bought them for restaurant use but I took a few for my home because they are THAT good. Don't hesitate to buy them because it doesn't get much better. I'll be back for more.
customer_reviews.author: Siobhan Darling

customer_reviews.title: Spoons
customer_reviews.text: Love these spoons. They are sturdy and shiny. Everyone at my house has used for soup and mac and cheese. One was used to scoop out ice cream and it did not bend.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: AmoVee is a Awesome Brand!!
customer_reviews.text: This was Delay in Shipping But it was not the Seller it was Amazon! anyway I got This a couple of Days LATE!and it was everything I Hope it would Be!Thank AmoVee for a Awesome Product!!will be Buying More!These are Great Soup Spoon I Got 8 And Each One IS Perfect Without any mark orSharp edge they are Very Pretty and Shinny just Beautiful AmoVee is a Great Company looking Forward to Years of use(they are a great size and weight)not 2 Heavy or Light!
customer_reviews.author: tealbrand

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of polishing my old silver plated soup spoons so I decided to look at an easier alternative. Look no further. These are absolutely perfect soup spoons. Wash up well and they are still shined.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry P.

customer_reviews.title: ... made some seafood gumbo and I bought some really nice both to go there and your scores were perfect ...
customer_reviews.text: I am over the moon excited it worked out because I'm not sure if you're familiar with New Orleans cuisine but I made some seafood gumbo and I bought some really nice both to go there and your scores were perfect so thank you so much I really appreciate it it was just sure I'll be buying some stuff from you again bye for now have a blessed day and happy new year
customer_reviews.author: Arley

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nicely constructed. Dishwasher safe. Not a lot more to say. Will buy again if I have a need for more soup spoons.
customer_reviews.author: Howler

customer_reviews.title: Excellent- High Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: These spoons are awesome! They are just the right size so they actually fit in a persons mouth. And better, a bonus! The handles are longer so they are comfortable to grip for elderly arthritic hands. Love that they come in a set of 8. Quality stainless that come individually wrapped so they aren't scratched and are oiled to prevent rusting while they were stored. Just wash in warm soapy water and they're ready to use. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Vincent

customer_reviews.title: They serve their purpose
customer_reviews.text: I don’t regret buying them at all They have a great purpose They are not heavy but I don’t care about that They serve their purpose I bought my mama some too
customer_reviews.author: billy

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: These soup spoons were what I was hoping for. After reading one negative review, I was a little worried, but that concern vanished when I got the spoons. No rough edges. Look like the picture. We had a soup and cornbread autumn party, and they were my extras mixed in with my flatware.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Useful.
customer_reviews.text: I've been an artist all my life. I'm not interested in copying...just in saving time by determining perspective. This really saves me time in measurement. Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Marion

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Love these cereal, soup spoons! Use them nearly everyday! Sturdy and look nice! Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Keller

customer_reviews.title: soup spoons
customer_reviews.text: Nice heavy weight, beautiful shape...just not as deep for soup as I would have liked.
customer_reviews.author: wasp54

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Good value at $1.50 each. Spoons are sturdy and well balanced. Polishing is good, but incomplete. Will need a very thorough washing, as there will be residual polishing compound on the spoons. I decided not to keep these, and upgraded to a set of Oneida "Europa" soup spoons, for an extra $2.50 per spoon.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Placed first order. Product Arrived quickly. Product is sturdy not heavy but not super light weight like a cheap spoon would be. Loved them so much I placed a Second order which arrived just as Fast. Perfect Product will last.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Barnhart

customer_reviews.title: Good spoons
customer_reviews.text: These spoons are hard to find to purchase. These are working out great.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry mouse

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great spoons! They have a fairly large mouth and are deep.
customer_reviews.author: Coinking1

customer_reviews.title: Wanted another set
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of a set of these spoons. I love them. I was short one spoon.Only 7 in the box. Amazon appears to be rectifying the situation.
customer_reviews.author: L. Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping they would be heavier. I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Kornovich

customer_reviews.title: Soup spoons
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the spoons, they are really the ones that we were hopping. Thanks. I recommended this product
customer_reviews.author: William S.

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT SIZE
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT SIZE BOWL AND LONGER HANDLE MAKES IT EASY TO HOLD
customer_reviews.author: Carol J. Wooldridge

customer_reviews.title: Great bargain
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for regular use and I'm quite pleased with the quality. Great value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: best "soup" spoons I've had in a long time. Long handle, nicely curved for "user friendly eating" and easy to eat soup, cereal, porridge, etc.
customer_reviews.author: vincefml

customer_reviews.title: Soup Spoons
customer_reviews.text: Why did I wait so long to purchase these, they are great!
customer_reviews.author: Chana Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great for soup and cereal
customer_reviews.text: Love these spoons 🥄 they are exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: A must for soup
customer_reviews.text: To truly enjoy soup, you must use the right spoon. There are very nice. Easy to clean and durable. Use them often.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Strayer

customer_reviews.title: Great soup spoons!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these soup spoons & love them! I have since ordered two more sets, one for my daughter, the other for my daughter in law. I think they will be as pleased as I am. They were packaged nicely and I received them promptly.
customer_reviews.author: S. Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Soup anyone?
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect soup spoons. Just the right size, so glad I got them.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah B

customer_reviews.title: My grown daughter loves these!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 27 and got a good laugh when she opened these at Christmas. She loves these spoons for cereal. Great price. Good quality. Would definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: These soup spoons are just what I wanted; not too wide, not too lightweight, just right.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Soup Spoons, Set of 8
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for, a good soup spoons! Love them and the price was right.
customer_reviews.author: Leticia G Quiroga

customer_reviews.title: Great soup spoons
customer_reviews.text: Love a good soup spoon!!! These were better than expected and are great for soups.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Best soup spoons!  Round Boullion type!
customer_reviews.text: Love as handles are longer mouth is rounded and fits better in small mouths
customer_reviews.author: Julie Anne Hoyt

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This is a Christmas gift, so they haven't been used. They arrived quickly and look very nice. A grandson has a preference for my spoons like this. These are not quite as sturdy as mine (and I can't remember where they were originally purchased). But, the shape is the same and I think he will be pleased with them for cereal and ice cream!
customer_reviews.author: BSKG1943

customer_reviews.title: Shiny and heavy
customer_reviews.text: These spoons are shiny, well packaged, well-priced, and heavy. I think they’ll hold up pretty well. I actually just them for cupping coffee, and they work pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: SpartanED

customer_reviews.title: Good quality spoons
customer_reviews.text: These are good quality spoons. They feel and look good. I purchased them because we have more people living at our house and we needed more spoons. I’ll will purchase more of them as needed.
customer_reviews.author: John Bickham

customer_reviews.title: Great spoon. Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Great heavy duty soup spoons. You can't beat these for the price. I was a little nervous about getting a "thin" and lightweight spoon, that possibly tasted like metal. (these do not) They are heavy and sturdy. Long enough. And the width and depth of the bowl part is perfect. I'm glad I bought these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and feel
customer_reviews.text: Really like these spoons, but had to smooth off some sharp edges around the bowl of the spoon. Otherwise 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: J. K. Lawton

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: I love these spoons .They where packaged very nicely. Exactly what I was looking for. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth s.

customer_reviews.title: They're OK
customer_reviews.text: Decent spoons for the price. But they are too shallow in my opinion. I also seem to somehow dribble on myself with these... I tried it first with ceral and I had milk all over my chin, weird.
customer_reviews.author: L.E.D.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Soup Spoon Value
customer_reviews.text: These have become our go to spoon for cereals, soups and almost anything else you might use a table spoon for. I would certainly purchase again. They are not heavy or ornate but they are functional and comfortable
customer_reviews.author: pingman07757

customer_reviews.title: Great set of spoons!
customer_reviews.text: Great spoons! I’ve been looking everywhere for these! So glad Amazon had them!
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: I would order again.
customer_reviews.text: These spoons are exactly what i was looking for! Nice and large for my homemade soups! They are sturdy and I've dishwashed them twice already with no wearing at all. ☺ They arrived on time and packaged well.
customer_reviews.author: KaiNai02

customer_reviews.title: You must buy these.
customer_reviews.text: These spoons are very good quality. Better then I anticipated. My family loved them. I bought another box as a gift. My mom also loved them. They are a must buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: A Wrigs

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: These spoons have great weight and balance. A simple sophisticated design. Great for soup, ice cream or what ever.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Nice Spoons
customer_reviews.text: These were exactly what we needed. Perfect Soup/Stew spoons for the fall/winter.
customer_reviews.author: ej

customer_reviews.title: The spoon still shine like they were still new.
customer_reviews.text: I like these spoons for the volume of liquid it holds.
customer_reviews.author: Cherrie Bothe

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Control
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much what you would expect for the price but one had a chunk missing out of the spoon. With each of them being individualy wrapped I would think their quality control would be a little better. We didn't mess with returning them...just threw that one away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The perfect soup spoon.
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect. Nice weight to them. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soup spoons
customer_reviews.text: Functional, clean design. The bowl of the spoon isn't so deep it can be overloaded. I really like these and would recommend to anyone who needs a good, basic soup spoon. Vendor is responsive.
customer_reviews.author: Elsie Whittle

customer_reviews.title: Great soup spoons
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with the value of these soup spoons. The length of the spoon is just right for handling.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Oakes

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality for a very affordable price
customer_reviews.text: I'm blown away by how nice these soup spoons are. They have an elegant look and a nice weight and feel. Some of the nicer spoons in my house, though I've paid much more for other silverware.
customer_reviews.author: Che Monique

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great.
customer_reviews.text: The material quality of these spoons is actually not bad. However, the finishing around the edge is not consistent. A few may have smoother edge but the other few are with edge slightly too shape for my like. Overall value is good.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Great service
customer_reviews.text: Good soup size spoon. Customer service from AmoVee was impeccable- I had an issue with the first set. They responded quickly and took complete care of the problem!! Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice spoons
customer_reviews.text: Received yesterday and by chance home made soup was on the stove . Cleaned spoons and used them . I liked the feel of them . Very happy
customer_reviews.author: factfilter

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Live my circular spoon. Sits really nicely in the drawer
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Rough, unfinished edges rust in dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: These spoons have unfinished edges (especially right where the handle meets the top of the spoon) that rust in the dishwasher and are a bit rough.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Averell

customer_reviews.title: I love these spoons
customer_reviews.text: I love these spoons! The bowl is just the right size for eating soup, and they handle is longer then most which makes them so easy to use. I would buy these again!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good price. Make eating soup so much nicer
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Good price. Make eating soup so much nicer. Got one set for myself and then ordered another as a gift for my sister. Fast delivery
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Great soup spoons
customer_reviews.text: The Soup spoons was exactly what I expected. It's a good product I would buy them again if I needed more.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Pasterczyk

customer_reviews.title: ... ate with this type spoon at a restaurant and loved them, so ordered these
customer_reviews.text: My 4 yr old ate with this type spoon at a restaurant and loved them, so ordered these. He loves them....so does the rest of the family.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Basic Gumbo Spoons - What We Wanted
customer_reviews.text: These are basic wide gumbo spoons you might find in an average restaurant. This is what we wanted for a large group to serve chicken gumbo. Nothing fancy, average weight.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Grace

customer_reviews.title: Long stem makes it easy for grand kids losing spoon in soup
customer_reviews.text: Soup lovers perfect spoon an absolute plus for my grandchildren
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad...for the price
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly these were nice spoons! Used them for soup and ice cream.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Soup Spoons
customer_reviews.text: WOW these are the perfect soup spoons in every way thanks to all the 5star reviews I went with this brand and so Happy I did even the length is long enough so the soup spoon doesn't slide in your bowl and hide in your soup.Thanks AmoVee and Amazon for having such a great product. Happy Customer:)
customer_reviews.author: kokomo

product_meta.title: Soup Spoons, AmoVee Wholesale Stainless Steel Alpha Round Spoons, Set of 8, FDA Approved
feature_bullets: 8-piece set of AmoVee stainless steel soup spoons
Durable shiny mirror finish and the smooth design with AmoVee's commitment to sterling quality.
Extra heavy weight stainless steel flatware, Thickness 4 mm. Every stainless steel soup spoon weights near 1.5 oz.
Working ends are modern, functional, and comfortable
Excellent choice of flatware for any restaurant or bar
